nodes.text: Ashley Eckstein (born Maria Ashley Drane on September 22, 1981) is the voice actress who portrayed Ahsoka Tano in the Star Wars: The Clone Wars film and television series from 2008 to 2013 and in 2020's revival season. She reprised the role in Star Wars Rebels from 2015 to 2018 and in the 2020 revival of The Clone Wars. Eckstein also narrated the audiobook edition of the novel Ahsoka, which focuses on the character.
In 2010, Eckstein founded the clothing manufacturer Her Universe, which specializes in science fiction and fantasy-themed fashion for girls and women, including Star Wars.
